is an Assistant professor at Clemson University. His research interests focus on
English language learners, including: effective pedagogy for emergent bilinguals, preparation of
teachers to work with culturally and linguistically diverse students, equitable policies for ELLs,
and ways to bridge community and out-of-school langugae and liteacy practices with school-
at University of York on April 28, 2015
